Posts.Content: wow that's fast,.... I had a therapeutic mammoplasty on 20th Aug, have decided to go for chemo, as breast cancer is prone to migrate to other parts of the body and mine is a grade 3. My main reason for doing chemo is that secondary cancer although treatable, is not curable, Will star chemo in a few weeks.
Posts.Title: Hi ... and help please!!

Posts.Content: Aug 20th plenty of time to get my head around it all. Enter your message...
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed and already on the roller coaster!
